info.name: booking-service
info.description:
**This is the service for booking.**

The full documentation to the service can be found in the link below

[https://doc.mozrest.com/api/rp/index.html#introduction](https://doc.mozrest.com/api/rp/index.html#introduction)

item.name: App

request.description:
**The endpoint check for booking time slots with the required parameter and body and return true if the time slot choosen is available and between venue opening period otherwise it return false for the website.**

**Accepted query Parameters data type**

| **Parameter** | **Status** | **Description** | **Type** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| **venueId** | Mandatory | Fanzo pub venue internal id. | integer |
| **date** | Mandatory | Booking date/time | string |
| **partySize** | Mandatory | No of guest | integer |

**This endpoint create booking as a pending status in other to hold it up to 7 minutes**

**Accepted query Parametersdata type**

| **Parameter** | **Status** | **Description** | **Type** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| **venueId** | Mandatory | Fanzo pub venue internal id. | Integer |
| **date** | Mandatory | Booking date/time | String |
| **partySize** | Mandatory | No of guest | integer |

**This endpoint get the booking Id and fixtureId when available to complete booking**

| **Parameter** | **Status** | **Description** | **Type** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| **bookingId** | Mandatory | Booking Id from mozrest | String |
| **fixtureId** | Optional | Fixture id booking is for | Integer |
| **specialRequest** | Optional | Member/user note | String |
| **contact\[firstname\]** | Mandatory | Contact's firstname | String |
| **contact\[lastname\]** | Mandatory | Contact's lastname | String |
| **contact\[telephone\]** | Mandatory | Contact's telephone | String |
| **contact\['email\]** | Mandatory | Contact's email | string |

**Note:**

- The **bookingId** in the route is the bookingId that was obtained earlier from the response from the pending booking endpoint.

**This endpoint cancel completed booking based on the id that is associated with the bookingId.**

| **Parameter** | **Status** | **Description** | **Type** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| **bookingId** | Mandatory | Booking Id from mozrest | string |

**Note:**

- The **bookingId** here is the string that was obtained from mozrest earlier from the commit booking endpoint.
This endpoint return the upcoming booking details

request.description:
This endpoint amend existing booking which take in the booking Id and the booking internal Id as part of the request and partySize and date in timestamp as the body

**Accepted query Parametersdata type**

| **Parameter** | **Status** | **Description** | **Type** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| bookingId | Mandatory | Booking Id from mozrest | string |
| Id | Mandatory | Fanzo pub venue internal id. | integer |
| partySize | Mandatory | No of guest | integer |
| date | Mandatory | Booking date/time slot | string |

item.description: This folder contains request related to the booking service app endpoint

item.name: Website

request.description:
**The endpoint check for booking time slots with the required parameter and body and return true if the time slot choosen is available and between venue opening period otherwise it return false for the app.**

**Accepted query Parameters data type**

| **Parameter** | **Status** | **Description** | **Type** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| **venueId** | Mandatory | Fanzo pub venue internal id. | integer |
| **date** | Mandatory | Booking date/time | string |
| **partySize** | Mandatory | No of guest | integer |

**This endpoint create booking as a pending status in other to hold it up to 7 minutes**

**Accepted query Parametersdata type**

| **Parameter** | **Status** | **Description** | **Type** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| **venueId** | Mandatory | Fanzo pub venue internal id. | Integer |
| **date** | Mandatory | Booking date/time | String |
| **partySize** | Mandatory | No of guest | integer |

**This endpoint get the booking Id and fixtureId when available to complete booking**

| **Parameter** | **Status** | **Description** | **Type** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| **bookingId** | Mandatory | Booking Id from mozrest | String |
| **fixtureId** | Optional | Fixture id booking is for | Integer |
| **specialRequest** | Optional | Member/user note | String |
| **contact\[firstname\]** | Mandatory | Contact's firstname | String |
| **contact\[lastname\]** | Mandatory | Contact's lastname | String |
| **contact\[telephone\]** | Mandatory | Contact's telephone | String |
| **contact\['email\]** | Mandatory | Contact's email | string |

**Note:**

- The **bookingId** in the route is the bookingId that was obtained earlier from the response from the pending booking endpoint.

**This endpoint cancel completed booking based on the id that is associated with the bookingId.**

| **Parameter** | **Status** | **Description** | **Type** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| **id** | Mandatory | Internal booking id | Integer |
| **bookingId** | Mandatory | Booking Id from mozrest | string |

**Note:**

- The **bookingId** here is the string that was obtained from mozrest earlier from the commit booking endpoint.
- The **Id** is the internal id associated to the bookingId

This endpoint retrieve a single booking details.

| **Parameter** | **Status** | **Description** | **Type** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| id | Mandatory | Internal booking id | integer |
| bookingId | Mandatory | Booking Id from mozrest | string |

response.name: booking details

item.description:
This folder contains request related to the booking service app endpoint

###
